newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Kevco coverage begins.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Kevco coverage begins.

text.p: -- Rauscher Pierce Refsnes Inc said Monday it began coverage of Kevco Inc with a rating of buy-market outperformer.
-- It estimates 1996 pro forma earnings at $1.32 a share and 1997 earnings at $1.60.
-- "We anticipate share price appreciation resulting from earnings growth and higher share valuations, and strongly recommend the purchase of shares of Kevco...," Rauscher Pierce said in a report.
-- Kevco is a wholesale distributor of building products to the manufactured housing and recreational vehicle industries.
